summary: Diff shows updates to `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` (new V37-style UI code with `INITIAL_SALONS`, Lucide imports, and client components like `StatusBadge`/`NexusCard`), plus edits to `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`. However, the AppV1 diff is truncated, so key acceptance criteria (full verbatim overwrite and the functional `setSalons(prev => ...)` publish injection) cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fully replace (overwrite) the entire contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V37 “NEXUS PRO MAX” code block provided by the user (no partial merges), preserving UI strings, components, seed data, Tailwind, and interaction logic.
missing_requirements.reason: The `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` content is truncated in the diff summary, so it’s not possible to verify a complete verbatim overwrite of the entire file (and that all specified flows/logic from the user-provided V37 block are present exactly).

missing_requirements.requirement: Make Pro “Publish” salon injection robust against stale state closures by using a functional update `setSalons(prev => [newSalon, ...prev])` while preserving behavior; ensure minimal mechanical adjustments only.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show the Pro publish handler or any `setSalons(prev => ...)` functional update; due to truncation, this requirement cannot be verified as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository metadata/state files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) as part of the change set.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies overwriting `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` (with minimal compile fixes) and explicitly focuses on frontend demo behavior; it does not request modifying these repo summary/state artifacts.
